description:
The attorneys at The Trapani Law Firm serve innocent accident victims and their families throughout Northampton County and the entire Lehigh Valley region from our office in Easton, Pennsylvania. Our team possesses the extensive experience and resources you need and is dedicated to resolving your personal injury claims efficiently. We can help increase your chances of securing the full amount of compensation you deserve for injuries and losses you suffered as the result of:

  • Automobile and truck accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Traumatic brain and spinal cord injuries
  • Birth injuries
  • Mesothelioma and toxic exposure
  • Dangerous property conditions
  • Defective products
  • Wrongful death
  • Construction and workplace injuries
  • Civil rights abuses

Regarded as one of Pennsylvania's leading personal injury practices, our law firm has grown to include six offices throughout the state, and we have secured millions of dollars in settlements and awards for our plaintiff clients. This success has earned us lifetime memberships in both the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates forums, and our attorneys have received many positive reviews from our satisfied clients as well as numerous accolades from our peers.

We have achieved this success by devoting our attention to those we serve and by providing the personalized, compassionate counsel and support they need during difficult and uncertain times. Although we promise to treat you and your family with care and respect, we will always aggressively pursue the most favorable outcome on your behalf to help increase your chances of obtaining the full amount of compensation you deserve.

To find out more about how The Trapani Law Firm can best serve your needs, call our office or visit our website to schedule a free initial consultation. We can meet you at your home or hospital room if your injuries prevent you from making it to our office.
